Name: Malastar
Unique Card: Immolate - While prepped, whenever you suffer \Damage{}, gain 1 \Money. \newline \Cast Deal 1 \Damage
Ability Description: Activate during your main phase: Gain a spell from any supply pile. You may prep that spell to any player's opened breach.

Name: Adelheim
Unique Card: Amethyst Shard - Gain 1 \Money{}. You may place any card costing 0 in any ally's discard pile in their hand.
Ability Description: Activate during the nemesis draw phase: After a nemesis attack or power card is drawn but before it is resolved, you may discard it. It has no effect. (The nemesis does not draw a replacement card)

Name: Phaedraxa
Unique Card: Tourmaline Shard - Gain 1 \Money. An ally may take 1 \Damage{} and destroy a card in their hand.
Ability Description: Activate immediately after a turn order card is drawn: Prevent any damage that the players or Gravehold would suffer during that turn.

Name: Xaxos
Unique Card: Flare- Deal 1 damage. Reveal the top card of the turn order deck. If you reveal a player turn order card, deal 2 additional damage.
Ability Description: Activate during any player's main phase: Allies collectively gain 4 charges. Reveal the turn order deck and return the revealed cards in any order.

Name: Z'hana
Unique Card: Eternal Ember - While prepped, when you cast a spell, you may discard this spell from play instead of the cast one. \newline \Cast Deal 1 damage.
Ability Description: Activate during your main phase: Gravehold gains 7 life.

Name: Brama
Ability Description: Activate during your main phase: Any player gains 4 life.

Name: Kadir
Unique Card: Emerald Shard - Gain 1 \Money. \Or any player gains 1 life.
Ability Description: Activate during any player's main phase: That player may return up to three spells in their discard pile to their hand. That player may prep up to two spells to each of their opened breaches this turn.

Name: Lash
Unique Card: Quartz Shard - Gain 1 \Money{}. Look at the top card of the turn order deck. If it is a player's turn card, gain 1 \Money. You may place that card on the bottom.
Ability Description: Activate during any player's main phase: Shuffle any player's turn order card into the turn order deck. That player suffers 1 damage. (You may not choose the wildcard turn order card.)

Name: Mist
Unique Card: Garnet Shard - Gain 1 \Money{} \newline \Or \newline Cast any player's prepped spell.
Ability Description: Activate during your main phase: Any ally draws 4 cards.

Name: Nym
Ability Description: Activate during your main phase: Discard the top card of the nemesis deck. If you discarded an attack, discard an additional card.

Name: Jian
Unique Card: Moonstone Shard - Gain 1 \Money{}. Gain 1 additional \Money{} that can only be used to gain a gem.
Ability Description: Activate during your main phase: Cast any player's prepped spell without discarding it. Then cast that prepped spell again. (Discard it afterward.)

Name: Reeve
Unique Card: Obsidian Shard - Gain 1 \Money{}. You may take 1 \Damage. If you do, gain 2 additional \Money{}.
Ability Description: Activate during your main phase: Deal 5 damage to a minion. Deal 3 damage to a different minion.
